required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-label, Long-term Study of Telmisartan Plus Amlodipine Fixed-dose Combination
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Long-term Study of Telmisartan Plus Amlodipine Fixed-dose Combination

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the long term safety and efficacy of telmisartan plus amlodipine FDC in patients with essential hypertension who failed to control their BP with either monotherapy

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Adverse Events
primary_outcome.description: An adverse event is defined as any untoward medical occurrence

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically Relevant Abnormalities for Changes in Blood Pressure and Pulse Rate Due to Position Change, Seated Pulse Rate, Laboratory Parameters and ECG
primary_outcome.time_frame: First administration of study treatment to 24 hours post last dosing of study treatment.
primary_outcome.description: Clinically relevant abnormalities for changes in blood pressure and pulse rate due to position change, seated pulse rate, laboratory parameters and ECG. New abnormal findings or worsening of baseline conditions were reported as adverse events.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure at Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: mean reduction from pseud-baseline (after the washout) in seated diastolic blood pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Seated Systolic Blood Pressure at Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: mean reduction from pseud-baseline (after the washout) in seated systolic blood pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated DBP Control Rate at Trough After 8 Weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose DBP <90 mmHg after 8 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated SBP Control Rate at Trough After 8 Weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose SBP <140 mmHg after 8 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Mean reduction from pseud-baseline (after the washout) in seated diastolic blood pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Seated Systolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.description: mean reduction from pseud-baseline (after the washout) in seated systolic blood pressure

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated DBP Control Rate at Trough After 6 and 12 Months
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose DBP <90 mmHg.

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated SBP Control Rate at Trough After 6 and 12 Months
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose SBP <140 mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated DBP Response Rate at Trough
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose DBP <90 mmHg or decreased from pseudo-baseline by >=10 mmHg at 6 months and 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated SBP Response Rate at Trough
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients whose SBP <140 mmHg or decreased deom pseudo-baseline by >=20 mmHg after 6 and 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Seated Blood Pressure Normalisation at Trough
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients when classifying their blood pressure measurements into the following classes at 6 and 12 months: Optimal: SBP <120 mmHg and DBP <80 mmHg Normal: SBP >=120 mmHg or DBP >=80 mmHg and SBP <130 mmHg or DBP <85 mmHg High normal: SBP >=130 mmHg or DBP >=85 mmHg and SBP <140 mmHg or DBP <90 mmHg No: SBP >=140 mmHg or DBP >=90 mmHg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients with essential hypertension
2. Outpatient
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients whose SBP >=180 mmHg or DBP >=110 mmHg at the end of treatment visit of the double-blind treatment period in the "non-responder trials"
- Patients who have met any of the exclusion criteria defined in the "non-responder trials"

group.title: Telmisartan 40 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Telmisartan 80 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Telmisartan 40 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Telmisartan 80 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Total

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Adverse Events
outcome.description: An adverse event is defined as any untoward medical occurrence
outcome.population: Treated set for safety, which was the analysis set including all the patients who had valid measurements after drug administration.

outcome.description: mean reduction from pseud-baseline (after the washout) in seated diastolic blood pressure

reported_events.time_frame: While being treated with T20+A5, T40/A5, T80/A5, T40/A5+additional treatment, T80/A5+additional treatment and within 24 hours from the last dosing of any of them.

group.title: Telmisartan 40 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Telmisartan 80 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
